The intrinsic nature of karma refers to either intentional karma or karma that has already been intended.

The causes and conditions of karma refer to the various kinds of craving.

The cessation of karma refers to the cessation of karma due to the cessation of craving.

Therefore, you monks, be diligent and do not be negligent,
You should well understand all karmic actions, and correctly cultivate their continuity.
In order to exhaust the nature of karmic actions and the causes and conditions of karmic actions,
